resumeText:
Abhishek Singh
􀁡 abhisheksingh.engineering@gmail.com 􀈲 (+91) 7088699616 􀁝 connect-with-abhishek
EXPERIENCE
Schrodinger. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
Senior Software Developer December 2021 - Present,
Hyderabad
Projects:
- Owned and developed multiple user stories for a complex
React-based web app, including research, architecture documentation,
and stakeholder engagement
- Led TypeScript migration by developing core classes with
generics and modernizing multiple components
- Migrated a web app from Appsmith to React, ensuring parallel
development and granular transformation, resulting in 2x
loading speed
- Integrated Storybook and Mock Service Worker (MSW) for
interactive component development, testing, and documentation
- Established Vite app infrastructure with Minikube supporting
Hot Module Replacement, and implemented CI/CD pipelines
using GitHub Actions
- Integrated WebSocket-based data feeds into React components
for live updates
Roles and Responsibilities:
- Led two sub-teams and managed multiple interns, providing
mentorship and guidance
- Engaged with Product Managers and stakeholders to align on
requirements, priorities, and roadmap
- Conducted code reviews and participated in user story and
architecture reviews to ensure best standards
DE Shaw India Private Limited. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
Associate Developer July 2020 - November 2021,
Hyderabad
- Developed a Landing Page with React and Java after thorough
research and stakeholder discussions
- Led a time-sensitive SOW project to integrate a 3D Molecule
Visualizer Tool into a React application
- Enhanced test automation by integrating Selenium tests
BNY Mellon. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
SDE Intern January 2020 - June 2020,
Pune
Rule Engine Design Project
- Developed a Java-based rule engine for processing tradesrelated
data within the company’s system
- Wrote Unit Tests, used Mutation Testing with PITest to ensure
robust validation of business rules and logic with high
code coverage
- Developed Jenkins pipelines for automated build, test, and
deployment, integrating test reports for better visibility
PERSONAL PROJECTS
Cortex-Bot. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
- Algo Trading platform to provide trade suggestions
using technical analysis.
- Able to place trades via a broker, analyze
and backtest a strategy
- Tech Stack - React, Vite, Python, FastAPI,
Kubernetes, Prometheus
SKILLS
Back End Java, Python, C++
Front End Javascript, Typescript, React
Tools Vite, Webpack, Rollup
Testing Selenium, Storybook, Jest
DevOps Docker, Jenkins, Git, Minikube,
Tilt
Soft Skills Leadership, communication
EDUCATION
NIT Uttarakhand 2020
B.Tech. in Computer Science
CGPA: 7.52 / 10.0
Beersheba Sr. Sec. School 2016
Senior Secondary | CBSE
Aggregate Percentage: 90.2
Himalayan Progressive 2014
Higher Secondary | CBSE
CGPA: 9.8 / 10.0
ACHIEVEMENTS

71st Google Hashcode 2019
6000+ teams worldwide
2nd in India • 71st overall
19th ACM-ICPC 2019-20 Regional
Top 10 Masterplan - IIMA TRBS 2019
Idea Pitching • 130+ teams
LANGUAGES
English (Fluent) • Hindi (Native)
jobDescription:
Job description
Ostron is looking for Human Resources to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey.

Prepare and review compensation and benefits packagesAdminister health and life insurance programsImplement training and development plansPlan quarterly and annual performance review sessionsUpdate employee records with new hire information and/or changes in employment statusMaintain organizational charts and detailed job descriptions along with salary recordsForecast hiring needs and ensure recruitment process runs smoothlyDevelop and implement HR policies throughout the organizationMonitor budgets by departmentProcess employees queries and respond in a timely mannerExcellent verbal and written communication skills

Disclaimer : This job description has been sourced from a public domain and may have been modified by Naukri. com to improve clarity for our users. We encourage job seekers to verify all details directly with the employer via their official channels before applying.
Role: HR Analyst
Industry Type: IT Services & Consulting
Department: Human Resources
Employment Type: Full Time, Permanent
Role Category: HR Operations
Education
UG: Any Graduate
PG: Any Postgraduate
Key Skills
HR
